cases.title: Life Care Planning Expert Witness' Testimony Excluded
cases.description: Although a Life Care Planning Expert Witness could testify, the court ruled his methodology and reasoning were unsupported speculation.

cases.title: Electrical Engineering Expert Witness Testifies on Electrical Shock
cases.description: The court allowed an Electrical Engineering Expert Witness to testify on Plaintiff's exposure to electrical current.

cases.title: Testimony of Orthopedic Surgery Expert Witness Excluded
cases.description: The testimony of an Orthopedic Surgery Expert Witness was not allowed because he did perform a comparative analysis of Plaintiff's pre-existing injuries.
